repnme.cdata!: Nigeria - Trade and Investment Policy Project

abstracts.cdata!:
This is the second in a series of quick
            disbursing loans, designed to support the Government's
            structural adjustment program. This Trade & Investment
            Policy Loan (TIPL) Project supports the consolidation of the
            exchange rate and trade policy initiatives. The policy
            agenda for the loan covers five broad areas : (i) the
            maintenance of a market determined exchange rate; (ii) the
            consolidation of the reform of the protection regime and
            institutional developments; (iii) the implementation of
            export promotion measures; (iv) the liberalization of the
            regulatory framework for private investment; and (v) the
            rationalization of the capital budgeting process and the
            public investment program.
